name: container-tabs-sidebar
description: A firefox addon that show tabs in a tree style structure in a sidebar. Inspired by Tree Style Tabs.

scripts.build: npm test && cd src && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.package: rm -rf src/web-ext-artifacts && npm run build && mv src/web-ext-artifacts/container_tabs_sidebar-*.zip addon.xpi

author: Maciej Mionskowski
